title: 关于/summon
author: MCer0
txt_content:
我要使用/summon指令生成一个村民，指令如下：
/summon Villager ~ ~1 ~ 
{Profession:2,
CustomName:"1",CustomNameVisible:1,
Attributes:[{Name:generic.maxHealth,Base:1}],

}

{maxUses:1,
buy:{id:6 2,Count:1,Damage:0},
sell:{id:1,Count:1,Damage:0,Damage:0S,}},



buy:{id:6 2,Count:1,Damage:0},中id:6 2代表桦木树苗，，可是提示解析失败，正确的应该怎么打？
只要单告诉我buy:{id:6 2,Count:1,Damage:0}这一条怎么改就够了

replies.author: End-Enderman
replies.txt_content: 请将指令改为/summon Villager ~ ~1 ~ {Profession:2,CustomName:"1",CustomNameVisible:1,Attributes:[{Name:generic.maxHealth,Base:1}],Offers:{Recipes:[{maxUses:1,buy:{id:6,Count:1,Damage:2},sell:{id:1,Count:1,Damage:0}}]}}复制代码指令也有错误

replies.author: lzs1234
replies.txt_content:
看到6 2我就笑了。
应该把2填到Damage里，Damage代表数据值
而且maxUses，buy和sell应该填进Recipes，而Recipes又应该填进Offers
要是不把这些改了把2填进Damage也没用
